E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Ruben Amaro Jr.
Dear Sir,
Ruben Amaro Jr. is hitting the ball well at AA Canton-Akron Indians!
He has an AVG of .314, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Troy Neel
Dear Sir,
Troy Neel has nothing more to prove at AA Canton-Akron Indians!
He has an AVG of .280 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director

me in the rotation?

Bob Owchinko

Date: Thursday, 5/29/1990
Subject: My role in this team
Sir,
I believe that I am deserving more than being a reliver.
I want a spot in the rotation, I think
I would do an adequate job. Otherwise, I'd like to play
elsewhere!

Regards,
Bud Black
